description: Holds a set of reusable objects for different aspects of the Arazzo Specification

^(inputs|parameters|successActions|failu.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().

anyOf.description: An object to hold reusable Failure Actions Objects

value.description: While the Arazzo Specification tries to accommodate most use cases, additional data can be added to extend the specification at certain points

^x-.description: MUST be a valid JSON object serialized as a string, e.g. "{\"key\": \"value\"}". Do NOT output plain text — the value must parse with JSON.parse().
